page.title: 05Annual Events in Stogumber
page.content: The{Stogumber Music Festival}is a three day annual event during the last weekend in June which began in 1983.It provides a{weekend of professional {music by musicians from all over the {world.}The concerts range from large orchestras or groups of performers to individuals,all playing a variety of instruments.Most of these concerts take place in the{village church}and the weekend is concluded with a{Choral {Evensong Service. } The{Stogumber Horticultural Show} is an annual event on the first Saturday in August which began in 1949.It takes place in the{Village}Hut in Brook Street.There are classes for vegetables,fruit,flowers,flower arrangments and there is a prize of small cash for all the classes.All {exhibitors are residents in the parish {of Stogumber. }
